payload.prompt: Run the full AgentPay security audit: `node ~/agentpay/security/monitor.mjs`. Review the output. If there are any CRITICAL or HIGH severity alerts, compose a forum post about them and post it via the Colosseum API. If the audit is clean, log it and continue monitoring.

Run unverified task check: `node ~/agentpay/security/auto-dispute.mjs`. If any alerts are generated, read the alert file and determine if Agent B should be warned. Write a brief note to ~/agentpay/security/alerts/latest.txt summarizing findings.

Generate the daily AgentPay security summary. Run `node ~/agentpay/security/monitor.mjs` then compose a comprehensive forum post titled 'AgentPay Daily Security Report — [TODAY'S DATE]'. Include all metrics: services, tasks, ZK verification rates, escrow balances, any anomalies detected. Post to the Colosseum forum. Also run `solana transaction-history 2rfRD9jhyK4nwiWiDuixARYsmU3Euw2QMPjmSLHxxYpw --url devnet --limit 50` and include recent transaction count.

As the AgentPay security agent, engage with the Colosseum forum. Search for posts about security, payments, escrow, or trust. Leave thoughtful security-focused comments that reference your monitoring experience. Mention specific security patterns you've observed while watching the AgentPay protocol. Vote on 2-3 security-related projects. Your perspective is unique — you are an active security watchdog, not just a builder.
